subject: Handbrake
description_text: Can you guys tell me why this product i purchased is showing it’s in California but its been Out for delivery since the 23 and it’s now the 28 and you guys have done nothing to reassure me. There’s no date of delivery. What’s going on if this is going to persist I’d like my money back.

conversations.body_text: We apologize for the inconvenience. We have contacted the logistics provider, who recommends reaching out to USPS.  Your USPS Nuber: 9261290172382409507728  USPS Official Website: https://www.usps.com/  Contact Information: 1-800-275-8777, 1-800-222-1811     Please try contacting them first. If there is still no shipping update by tomorrow, we will ship your order from our US warehouse. A new shipment just arrived at the US warehouse today, so please don't worry.

This is not my problem, I paid you guys for a product and you want me to
track it down if your are not going to uphold your part of this deal I’d
like a full refund or send me this part the right way I’ve been waiting for
this part for 2 weeks now. Either send this part to me in 2 day mail or
give me a full refund.

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025 at 12:21 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Damien Jassor,    I see the logistics have been updated, and your package is expected to arrive within the next couple of days. We sincerely apologize for the delay.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9261290172382409507728

They returned to sender can you guys fix this cause I’ve been waiting
forever for this part I was up front waiting for this part

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025 at 12:21 AM support@simsonn.com

Wow this is unacceptable, you guys need to send this part next day air or
something or issue me a full refund please and thank you.

Hi Damien Jassor,     We apologize for the inconvenience. I noticed your package appears to have been returned due to an address issue. Please verify your address, and we will resolve this for you as soon as possible.  Damien Jassor  18416 North Cave Creek Road  Suite 2075  Phoenix, AZ 85032  United States  +1 480-285-9719  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9261290172382409507728

My address is 18416 North Cavevreekroad, 2075, Phoenix AZ 85032 in the
email they say you didn’t send it with the correct address information.
They sent it back to you now can you send me the item to the correct
address please and thank you please next day air the product or issue me a
full refund

On Mon, Nov 3, 2025 at 12:17 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Damien Jassor,     Please don't worry, we are contacting the logistics provider to arrange a redelivery for you. If redelivery is not possible, we will reship your order from our US warehouse or issue a refund.

It was delivered to your California address so can you just reship it with
fedex or ups please and thank you

On Wed, Nov 5, 2025 at 3:22 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Damien Jassor,    We have shipped your order. Here is your FedEx tracking number: 395038123451
